Subject: Proto gets a face lift
Date: Tue, 18 Mar 2003 00:21:06 +0000
X-Mailer: AT&T Message Center Version 1 (Nov  5 2002)

 Proto was going insane in his mind. he plummeted down deep into a  crevise in 
the earth. There a black ooze found him. This ooze's origins and how long itd 
been or if there was more of it were unknown. It jumped on Proto and do to his 
liquid body it used the pure enrgon as food. He first screamed out in pain. He 
couldnt control his body, he was transforming randomly and not even in shapes 
just blobs of black silver goo. He struggled to control it. His spark pulsed 
and cringed. He exploded all his strength and he gained some sort of reality 
of himself. His skin became hard again. His body was compeltely black now. 
With a silver decepticon symbol on his back and chest. He had two white eye 
symbols on his face but no mouth opening though hed still be able to speak 
telepathicly. He stood up and flexed. "Ive never felt so alive! I am no longer 
proto my name is Carnatron!!" he leaped off takeing incredibly long strides 
into the air, tohughts ran through his head wondering what this...thing could 
do.
